analysis.description:

Slotthereum.pointer should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x510467f65a600926af2ed565419ad98cf1f706ed.sol#33)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/18/0x510467f65a600926af2ed565419ad98cf1f706ed.sol#104-105:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0x510467f65a600926af2ed565419ad98cf1f706ed.sol:

Parameter '_maxBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMaxBetAmount (/unique_chucks/18/0x510467f65a600926af2ed565419ad98cf1f706ed.sol#179) is not in mixedCase
